1001.name: Going Away
1001.description: Either because of a server failure or because the client is navigating away.

1002.name: Protocol Error
1002.description: Endpoint terminated the connection due to a protocol error.

1003.name: Unsupported Data
1003.description: Endpoint received data of a type it cannot accept.

1005.name: No Status Received
1005.description: Missing status code even though one was expected.

1008.name: Policy Violation
1008.description: Endpoint received a message that violates its policy.

1009.name: Message too big
1009.description: Endpoint received a data frame that was too large.

1010.name: Missing Extension
1010.description: Server did not negotiate one or more extension expected by client.

1014.name: Bad Gateway
1014.description: Server acting as gateway received an invalid response.

1015.name: TLS Handshake
1015.description: Failure while performing the TLS handshake.
